Print Preview Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Click the Preview button that appears throughout the Print dialog box to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to preview a thumbnail image of the document you want to print.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Next—Navigates to the thumbnail of the next page of the document.
  • Previous—Navigates to the thumbnail of the previous page of the document.
  • Print—Opens the Print dialog box and closes the Print Preview dialog box.
    Note  Maximize the Print Preview dialog box if the thumbnail appears distorted.
